original_title: VHS Forever?: Once Upon a Time In Camden
overview: A feature-length documentary following on from the success of the 2014 cult classic fan-favorite 'VHS Forever? Psychotronic People'. Taking the viewer back to the very origins of the Psychotronic shop and this time interviews people who worked there along with the regular customers who visited every week. We also take a look at some of the many varied mad, bad and dangerous psychotronic films which you could purchase from the notorious secret 'back room' of the shop.
title: VHS Forever?: Once Upon a Time In Camden
